text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
This obsoletes IRM 4.60.7, International Procedures, Guidelines for Evaluating International Referrals.

This IRM is obsolete. International Referral Recipients (IRRs) can consider general recommendations provided in “IRR Guidelines for Evaluating International Referrals” when evaluating referrals, located on the CBA Practice Area SharePoint site under the CBA Toolbox.
LB&I, SB/SE, TE/GE managers, examiners and specialists.
Assistant Deputy Commissioner Compliance Integration Large Business and International Division
